content.body: syg: I just noticed that Explicit Resource Management is shipping in Chrome, despite [the source](https://chromium.googlesource.com/v8/v8/+/refs/heads/main/src/flags/flag-definitions.h#295) suggesting it is behind the `--harmony` flag.  Does Chromium always enable `--harmony` now?
content.formatted_body: syg: I just noticed that Explicit Resource Management is shipping in Chrome, despite the source suggesting it is behind the --harmony flag. Does Chromium always enable --harmony now?
